00030 #if !defined(TARLIB_H)
00031 #define TARLIB_H
00032 
00033 #if _MSC_VER >= 1000
00034 #pragma once
00035 #endif // _MSC_VER >= 1000
00036 
00037 #ifndef UINT32
00038 #define UINT32 unsigned int 
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 // Tar file field sizes
00042 #define MAX_OBJECT_NAME     100
00043 #define MAX_FILE_MODE       8
00044 #define MAX_OWNER_USER_ID   8
00045 #define MAX_GROUP_USER_ID   8
00046 #define MAX_FILE_SIZE       12
00047 #define MAX_LAST_MOD_TIME   12 
00048 #define MAX_HDR_CHECKSUM    8
00049 #define MAX_MODE_FLAG       1
00050 #define MAX_LINK_FILE_NAME  100
00051 #define TAR_PAD             255
00052 #define TAR_BLOCK_SIZE      512
00053 #define MAX_FILE_CHECKSUM   12
00054 
00055 // Bycast requested these strings
00056 #define FILE_MODE_STR        "0000755"
00057 #define OWNER_USERID_STR     "0000766"
00058 #define GROUP_USERID_STR     "0000766"
00059 
00060 // Tar files must be rounded up to nearest 512 block
00061 #define  NEXT_BLOCK(_bytes) ((TAR_BLOCK_SIZE - (_bytes % TAR_BLOCK_SIZE)) % TAR_BLOCK_SIZE)
00062 // Macros to parse "objectname.filechecksum" string
00063 #define  GET_FILENAME(_dest, _source) (strncpy(_dest, _source, strlen(_source) - MAX_FILE_CHECKSUM))
00064 #define  GET_FILECHK(_dest, _source) (strncpy(_dest, &_source[strlen(_source) - (MAX_FILE_CHECKSUM - 1)], MAX_FILE_CHECKSUM - 1))
00065 
00066 // Misc
00067 #define  FREE_FILE        true
00068 #define  DONT_FREE_FILE   false
00069 #define  FILE_INTO_CHUNK  true
00070 #define  CHUNK_INTO_FILE  false
00071 #define  CREATE_FILE      true
00072 #define  DONT_CREATE      false
00073 #define  DONT_SHARE       false
00074 
00075 // Error Types
00076 #define  ERR_MEM          1
00077 #define  ERR_OPEN         2
00078 #define  ERR_READ         3
00079 #define  ERR_WRITE        4
00080 #define  ERR_CHECKSUM     5
00081 #define  ERR_NOFILE       6
00082 
00083 // ReadNextFile instructions
00084 #define  NEXT             0
00085 #define  FIRST            1
00086 #define  USE_OBJNAME      2
00087 
00088 // Error struct
00089 typedef struct TarException {
00090         int       Type;
00091         string   Name;
00092         __int64   Size;
00093 } TarException_t;
00094 
00095 typedef struct Header {
00096         char    ObjectName[MAX_OBJECT_NAME];
00097         char    FileMode[MAX_FILE_MODE];
00098         char    OwnerUserID[MAX_OWNER_USER_ID];
00099         char    GroupUserID[MAX_GROUP_USER_ID];
00100         char    FileSize[MAX_FILE_SIZE];
00101         char    LastModTime[MAX_LAST_MOD_TIME];
00102         char    Checksum[MAX_HDR_CHECKSUM];
00103         char    ModeFlag[MAX_MODE_FLAG];
00104         char    LinkFileName[MAX_LINK_FILE_NAME];
00105         char    Pad[TAR_PAD];
00106 } Header_t;
00107 
00108 typedef struct FileData {
00109         Header_t  Header;
00110         void     *File;
00111         char      ObjectName[MAX_OBJECT_NAME];
00112         long      FileSize;
00113         long      HeaderSize;
00114         __int64   CurrentReadPos;
00115         long      ChunkOffset;
00116 } FileData_t;
00117 
00118 typedef struct Filename {
00119         struct   Filename *Next;
00120         struct   Filename *Prev;
00121         char     ObjectName[MAX_OBJECT_NAME];
00122         __int64  Offset;
00123 } Filename_t;
00124 
00125 typedef struct TarFile {
00126         string      Name;       // Keep this 1st - see Init()
00127         int          Handle;             // Keep this 2nd - see Init()
00128         int          State;
00129         bool         FileCreated;
00130 } TarFile_t;
00131 #define   TAR_CLOSED  0
00132 #define   TAR_OPEN    1
00133 
00134 class CTarCallback
00135 {
00136 public:
00137         CTarCallback(void) {};
00138         ~CTarCallback(void) {};
00139         virtual int FileReadyCallback(void *File, string ObjectName, unsigned int FileSize) = 0;
00140 };
00141 
00142 class CTar
00143 {
00144 
00145 public:
00146                  CTar(string TarFile);             // File mode
00147                  CTar(CTarCallback *TarCallback);   // Streaming mode
00148         virtual ~CTar();
00149         string   GetLastError(void);
00150         int      AddFile(void *File, string ObjectName, unsigned int FileSize);
00151         int      AddFile(string Filename, string ObjectName);
00152         int      DeleteFile(string ObjectName);
00153         __int64  GetTarSize(void);
00154         int      GetNumFiles(void);
00155         bool     Verify(string ObjectName = "");
00156         void            FreeFileMemory(void *& File);
00157         int             ReadNextFile(void *& File, string& ObjectName, int& FileSize);
00158         int             ReadNextFile(string& ObjectName, string Path, int WhatFile = NEXT);
00159    int      ReadNextFile(iostream & File, string& ObjectName);
00160         int             ReadFirstFile(void *& File, string& ObjectName, int& FileSize);
00161         int             ReadFirstFile(string& ObjectName, string Path);
00162         int             ReadFile(void *& File, string ObjectName, int& FileSize);
00163         int      ReadFile(string& ObjectName, string Path);
00164         int             ReadVerifiedChunk(void *Memory, unsigned int FileSize, bool First = false);
00165         int             ReadFirstVerifiedChunk(void *Memory, unsigned int FileSize);
00166         void     StartStream(void);
00167         int             AddChunk(void *Memory, unsigned int Size);
00168         char* GetFirstFileName();
00169 
00170 protected:
00171         void     Init(void);
00172         void     ProcessException(TarException_t Error);
00173         int      OpenFile(TarFile_t& File, bool Create = DONT_CREATE, bool Share = DONT_SHARE);
00174         int      OpenTar(bool Create = DONT_CREATE);
00175         void     CloseFile(TarFile_t& File);
00176         void     CloseTar(void);
00177         Filename_t  *AddFilenameToList(string ObjectName, __int64 Offset);
00178         Filename_t  *UpdateFilenameOffset(string ObjectName, __int64 Offset, bool StripChecksum = false);
00179         void     DeleteFilenameFromList(string ObjectName);
00180         int      FillFilenameList();
00181         __int64  GetOffsetFromFilenameList(string ObjectName);
00182         void     WriteTarFile(Header_t Header, void *File, unsigned int FileSize);
00183         int      OverwriteCurrentFile(Header_t Header);
00184         UINT32   GetChecksum(void *Memory, unsigned int FileSize);
00185         bool     VerifyChecksum(void *Memory, unsigned int FileSize, UINT32 Checksum);
00186         bool     VerifyHeader(Header_t Header);
00187         int      ReadVerifyHeader(Header_t &Header);
00188         void            SkipFileToNextHeader(char *FileSize);
00189         bool     VerifyFile(void *& File, long Filesize, char *ObjectName);
00190         int      ReadVerifyFile(void *& File, Header_t Header);
00191         void     FillHeader(Header_t &Header, string ObjectName, unsigned int FileSize, UINT32 FileChecksum);
00192         int             ReadFileData(FileData_t &File, bool First = false);
00193         unsigned int TarMemCpy(long &Offset, void *& Dest, unsigned int &Remaining,
00194                                     void *Source, unsigned int Len, bool StreamFlow);
00195         unsigned int CopyChunk(FileData_t& FileData, void *& Chunk,
00196                                     unsigned int Remaining, bool StreamFlow = FILE_INTO_CHUNK);
00197         void     ResetFile(FileData_t &FileData, bool FreeFile = FREE_FILE);
00198         bool     FileReady(unsigned int Remaining);
00199         void     CreateSubDir(string Path, string ObjectName);
00200 
00201 
00202         string          m_LastError;
00203         TarFile_t       m_TarFile;
00204         Filename_t     *m_FilenameList;
00205         char            m_NULLBLOCK[TAR_BLOCK_SIZE];
00206         FileData_t      m_ReadFile;
00207         FileData_t      m_ReadChunk;
00208         FileData_t      m_ChunkStream;
00209         CTarCallback   *m_TarCallback;
00210 };
